text:
Our Top 20 Products From Amazon’s Beauty Bestsellers List
Looking for a little beauty-shopping intel? We've got you.
Amazon&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) has a list of bestselling hair, skin-care, and makeup products that gets updated on the reg. It showcases the top 100 products users shop for, aka the ones that have garnered thousands of five-star reviews, get reordered constantly, and go viral on TikTok. Clearly, it's the perfect place to find some inspiration for a beauty refresh, so we dove into this list of bestsellers, reading through the reviews and compiling rave reviews from our editors to recommend the 20 favorites we can't recommend enough.
Whether you're looking for the
best toner for acne-prone skin, a face sunscreen that won't cause breakouts, or a blow-dryer brush that fakes the look of a blowout from home, it's easy to see why customers love these and buy them time and time again. Keep reading to shop our 20 favorite bestselling beauty products from Amazon worth coveting in 2024.
— Additional reporting by Marisa Petrarca
Best Eyeliner
e.l.f. No Budge Retractable Eyeliner&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($4, originally $5)
For the makeup-lovers, you won't want to skip this eyeliner. The site's highest-rated eyeliner is one that people love. The drugstore bestseller has over 10,000 five-star ratings and a 4.4 average rating, so you know it's good. Customers love its smooth application that lasts day and night.
Best Mascara
Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($5)
You might be surprised to discover that Amazon's second top-selling beauty product is a $5 mascara, but once you try it for yourself, you'll understand why. It has more than 330,000 (!) reviews and a 4.4 rating and is the brand's bestselling mascara.
Our beauty editor tested it out on her own lashes and was amazed by how much length and volume she got from just a single sweep. Read all about her thoughts in this
Essence Lash Princess False Lash Effect Mascara review.
Best Tinted Lip Balm
Revlon Kiss Tinted Lip Balm&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($6)
You're looking at the number one bestseller among all the lip balms available on Amazon. What makes this one so special is that it goes on smoothly, moisturizes lips, and gives lips a touch of color that isn't hard to maintain throughout the day. It comes in a handful of shades — our favorite is this pretty berry hue.
Best Makeup Sponge
Beakey 5-Pcs Makeup Sponge Set&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($6, originally $13)
This beauty blender is currently the best makeup sponge on the site. Customers love how the sponges seamlessly blend in makeup and make it stay put. It has over 90,000 customer ratings, and 76 percent of reviewers give the set a perfect five stars.
"I would say these are very comparable high-end blending sponges for a fraction of the price," one customer wrote. "Easy to use, soft, applies foundation, and blends my bronzer well. They also are a lot easier to clean than many of the blending sponges I have used in the past — not sure why, but definitely a major plus!"
Best Hairbrush
Wet Brush Original Detangler Hair Brush&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($7, originally $15)
If you haven't tried this hairbrush yet, then you're missing out. Made with soft bristles, the detangler won't pull or rip on your hair, even when it's knotted or tangled. The brand boasts that it works great on all hair types and is a painless way to go, especially if your hair is on the more tangled side.
The reviews of this brush speak for themselves. With more than 57,000 reviews, 85 percent of customers gave it five stars. Plus, it comes in 18 fun colors and prints that'll be the perfect addition to your collection.
Our former beauty editor says this is the only brush she'll use. Read all about her experience with it in this
Wet Brush Original Detangler Hair Brush review.
Best Eyebrow Pencil
Maybelline Total Temptation Eyebrow Definer Pencil&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($9)
Fill in your brows with this bestselling eyebrow pencil. This popular choice has over 115,000 reviews and a 4.5-star rating. Customers love its angled shape that's easy to use and the mini spoolie brush that softly defines your brows and brushes them out. It comes in four shades: blonde, soft brown, medium brown, and deep brown.
Best Concealer
Maybelline Makeup Instant Age Rewind Concealer&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($9, originally $11)
This super-concentrated concealer formula is infused with goji berry to brighten and illuminate the undereye area while it covers up your dark circles. The soft, spongy applicator allows the formula to glide on smoothly; the product is evenly distributed across your skin. After a couple swipes, simply tap the concealer with your finger until it's fully blended. This concealer has over 215,000 reviews and 68 percent of buyers give it a perfect five star rating.
Our former commerce director gave it a try and says it made her dark circles completely disappear. Read all about her experience in this
Maybelline Makeup Instant Age Rewind Concealer review.
Best Hair Oil
Mielle Organics Rosemary Mint Scalp & Hair Strengthening Oil&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($9, originally $10)
Chances are you've scrolled past this scalp and hair oil on TikTok, or maybe it's already an unwavering part of your beauty routine. Whatever the case, there's no doubt it's a hit among shoppers. They rave about how it helps with hair growth and makes their hair shiny and soft, in addition to providing much-needed moisture to dry scalps.
Best Makeup-Removing Wipes
Neutrogena Makeup Removing Wipes&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($10, originally $14)
To deeply clean your face without a sink nearby, or before you cleanse your face, these makeup wipes are the top-rated choice. These makeup-remover towelettes work to dissolve all traces of dirt, oil, and makeup on skin.
This drugstore favorite is one of the highest-rated products on Amazon with a 4.8-star rating, which is impressive considering it has over 90,000 reviews! If you love them, you can even try these little
travel-size ones&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) to take on the go. Our former commerce director swears by these and says all she needs is one wipe for a fresh and clean, makeup-free face. Read about why she loves them in this Neutrogena Makeup Removing Wipes review.
Best Face Wash for Acne
PanOxyl Acne Foaming Wash&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($10)
This foaming face wash might be your new go-to if you're dealing with pesky bumps and pimples. It uses the maximum strength of benzoyl peroxide available over-the-counter (10 percent) to fend off acne-causing bacteria. Plus, it's one of actress
Madelyn Cline's favorites.
Best Toner
Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel Toner&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($11)
Toners are a fantastic way to even skin tone and control blemishes, but they can often be extremely drying. This alcohol-free formula is a bestseller at Amazon; it keeps skin clear without stripping it of moisture.
The product has more than 21,000 reviews, and an impressive 77 percent of customers give it five stars. People claim that it helps with a multitude of problems including acne, dark spots, the appearance of pores, and hydration. The soothing toner includes rose-petal water, vitamin E, and witch-hazel extract.
The tannins in witch-hazel extract act as a natural astringent, so they remove excess oil from skin without depleting it of moisture. The rose water also helps to quench your face, plus it smells amazing. Basically, this liquid is pure magic.
Our former commerce director tested it out and wrote about her experience in this
Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel Toner review.
Best Essence
COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence &asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($14, originally $25)
Many shoppers praise this skin-care essence to a nearly spiritual degree. Its hero ingredient is snail mucin, a substance with a bevy of benefits, including moisturizing, reducing acne with the help of antimicrobial properties, and subtly reducing wrinkles and antioxidants, which shield the skin from free radicals and prevent fine lines and wrinkles. One of our editors is a fan; read her
COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence review for more.
Best Hyaluronic-Acid Gel
Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Face Gel&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($16, originally $27)
If hyaluronic acid is one of your favorite skin-care chemicals to use, then no doubt this moisturizing gel is your match. The bestselling formula acts as a sponge for dry skin and can absorb up to 1,000 times its weight in water. Its lightweight and gel-like texture will highly moisturize your skin without making it oily. Over 80,000 customers have reviewed this product, and 79 percent of them give it a perfect five stars. Our former editor has been using it for years and refuses to switch. She writes all about it in this
https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/Neutrogena-Hydro-Boost-Water-Gel-Review-44701095 review.
Best Face Cream
CeraVe Moisturizing Cream&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($18, originally $19)
Looking for a new face cream? We found your match. Get a solid 24 hours of hydration with this moisturizing cream. Customers love it because it keeps their skin soft and supple without feeling greasy.
"I have extremely dry skin that's also acne-prone and sensitive," a customer wrote. "That's a tough combination to treat because most products that heavily moisturize also cause acne. This lotion is by far the best I've used! I can slather it on as much as I want without any irritation or acne and it soaks right in and soothes my dry skin. I'm a lifetime customer for sure."
Best Face Towels
Clean Skin Club Clean Towels XL&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($18)
Clean Skin Club towels are another TikTok hit, praised for the way they help streamline your face cleansing routine by ensuring your face towels are clean and bacteria-free. They're biodegradable and multipurpose in that you can use them to dry your face after cleansing, pair them with a makeup remover to wipe off makeup, and more. Learn more in our
Clean Skin Club Clean Towels XL review.
Best Acne Spot Treatment
Rael Miracle Bundle&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($40, originally $47)
The beauty of these acne spot treatment patches is that they don't just address a single stage of acne. There is a microcrystal early stage patch, an invisible patch that gently draws out impurities, an overnight patch, and even a postcare patch that treats the dark spot that the healing blemish becomes.
Our editor tried these patches out and said they're a "total lifesaver." She felt comfortable wearing the invisible patch during video calls for work and even stepped out in them. Read all about her experience with each of these patches in this
Rael Ultimate Pimple Patch Kit review.
Best Hairstyling Tool
Revlon One-Step Volumizer Enhanced Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($40)
Over 10,000 buyers have reviewed this hairstyling tool and 78 percent of those people give it a perfect five stars. What makes this tool unique is that it's a brush and blow-dryer in one product. The oval brush is designed for smoothing the hair, while the round edges create volume.
The brush is also a favorite on TikTok. Our editor tried it, and you can read all about her experience with it in this
Revlon One-Step Volumizer Enhanced Hair Dryer And Hot Air Brush review.
Best Exfoliant
Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Salicylic Acid Exfoliant&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($43)
This popular exfoliant is a great choice. The BHA formula is made to help unclog and diminish enlarged pores while also deeply exfoliating and getting rid of dead skin cells. Customers love that it helps even out their skin tone.
It has 85,000 customer reviews, 74 percent of which are five-star testimonials. You can read the reviews on Amazon and even see before-and-after photos. Plus, the $43 set comes with both a small and large option, so you can have one to take on your next trip.
Best Sunscreen
EltaMD Face and Body Zinc Oxide Sunscreen Set&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($67, originally $71)
Wearing sunscreen daily is key to your routine, so if you're still looking for the right match, you might want to try this duo. The gentle and lightweight formula is great for those with acne-prone and oily skin types, as customers rave that it won't break you out.
The hydrating and protective formula helps keep you moisturized and protected, so what's not to love? This two-piece set is a bestseller because you get two of its best products, one for the face and one for the body, for an affordable price.
Best Vitamin C Serum
Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum&asc_refurl=https://www.popsugar.com/beauty/bestselling-beauty-products-amazon-45970500&ascsubtag=___psv__p_45970500__t_w_) ($72)
This oil-free, noncomedogenic moisturizer also doubles as a serum. It combines three forms of vitamin C with lactic acid and antioxidants like niacinamide and squalane to replenish the skin's moisture barrier, brighten, and soften fine lines.
One of our editors tested this serum out and said it's "worth every penny." She used it for two-plus weeks and was thrilled at the results, even documenting them with before and after photos in this
TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum review. "After using this serum for 16 days, you can see how my dark spots have gradually faded, and my overall skin tone is brighter. On top of that, my skin's texture has improved significantly; my pores don't appear as big, my breakouts have decreased, and my skin looks more refined," she writes.
